name: nest-microservices-poc
description: NestJS Microservices Proof of Concept with User and Notification Services

scripts.quickstart: npm run install:all && npm run build:all && npm run start:all
scripts.install:services: cd services/user-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install && cd ../api-gateway && npm install
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:user" "npm run start:notification" "npm run start:gateway"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:user && npm run build:notification && npm run build:gateway
